column1: The Most Favored Nation executive order is the last thing we need in the fight against COVID-19. Government price controls serve only to disincentivize the development of innovative treatments and cut access to vital drugs that hundreds of thousands of Americans depend on daily.
I want to thank @PatrickMcHenry in particular for his help on crafting this bill. 4/4

This legislation clears the way for North Carolina to include these essential personnel in their government retirement plans to provide benefits to the hundreds of men and women who risk their lives providing invaluable community services. 3/4

For years the IRS has prevented nonprofit firefighters and EMS personnel from joining the North Carolina state retirement system despite providing the same emergency and community services as those employed by the state. 2/4
Today some of my colleagues and I from North Carolina introduced a bill to allow nonprofit firefighters and emergency medical service workers to join a state or local retirement system. 1/4
Hoping @realDonaldTrump and the First Lady have a speedy recovery from coronavirus. My thoughts and prayers are with you both.

The PPP has broad bipartisan support. It provides food assistance assists schools re-opening and helps stop the spread of Covid-19. Speaker Pelosi is only interested in politics as usual. We should be helping Americans in need by extending the PPP -- not playing politics.
Lucy and I were saddened to learn about the passing of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg last night. Our prayers are with her family.  https://t.co/uRqRdagjqH

Today Bahrain joined the U.A.E. in striking an agreement to establish full diplomatic relations with Israel -- normalizing relations across the Middle East is truly historic on the anniversary of 9-11. https://t.co/E18A9bpaOf
https://t.co/qfrdAk314E
.Happy #GibraltarNationalDay @FabianPicardo

As Co-Chair of the Congressional Caucus on India the Indian-American community has my full support — anyone with information should contact the police.

The Cary Police Department has identified a man who was found shot dead in a Cary neighborhood on Thursday afternoon. Anyone with information about this heinous and senseless murder should contact the Cary Police Department at (919)469-4012. https://t.co/QOR2htvRcI
Thank you President Tsai. Lifting restrictions on imports of U.S. pork and beef will lead to even greater bilateral trade opportunities. https://t.co/0KKuXLaMCl

@IndianEmbassyUS @SandhuTaranjitS @MEAIndia @cgihou @CGI_Atlanta @CGISFO @IndiainChicago @IndiainNewYork @SudhakarDalela @KumarAmitMEA @PMOIndia @harshvshringla .@IndianEmbassyUS Ties between the United States and India have never been stronger. Happy 74th Independence Day!
Lucy and I were saddened to learn about the passing of John Lewis this morning. His legacy will live on. Our prayers are with his family.

On behalf of the Caucus on India and Indian Americans my Co-Chair Brad Sherman and I expressed our condolences to Amb. Sandhu for the lives lost at the Line of Actual Control in the Galway Valley. Below is the letter that was sent today:  https://t.co/fB48GFC3Nv
Happy Fourth of July! https://t.co/aJSVUFkxaE
Peacefully protesting is welcomed in North Carolina. But lawlessness violence and the destruction of property have to stop.
The Paycheck Protection Program needs to be replenished as soon as possible to protect our small businesses -- it has helped support an estimated 30 million jobs. https://t.co/A13PxBg24A
The IRS has launched a new website to track the status of your economic impact payment. You can check yours here:  https://t.co/4bmZ46l1Lr

For most folks economic impact payments will be automatic. Nothing is needed by those who filed tax returns in 2018 and 2019 and for most seniors and retirees. You can learn about how you are eligible here:  https://t.co/zMqH5Pd0Cc

VETERANS: The VA has expanded virtual mental health care services during the coronavirus crisis so that you can now access your healthcare provider from your computer tablet or phone. You can learn more here:  https://t.co/9aqyZHNvCq
From my family to yours Happy Easter!
Hopefully this cease-fire and the 100’s of millions of dollars given for humanitarian relief by the Saudis will moderate the impact of the coronavirus in Yemen.
The Saudi-led coalition fighting the Iranian-backed rebels in Yemen announced a 2 week cease-fire to battle the spread of coronavirus.

If you have questions about receiving an economic impact payment be sure to check the link below.  It's important to remember that the IRS will not call text email or contact you on social media asking for personal banking information.  https://t.co/D4mGxFo7Ks

SMALL BUSINESS OWNERS: The Paycheck Protection Program authorizes up to $349 billion in forgivable loans to small businesses to pay their employees during the coronavirus crisis. You can learn more about that program here.  https://t.co/ubp4Hsg4v3

“Social Security recipients who are not typically required to file a tax return need to take no action and will receive their payment directly to their bank account” said Treasury Secretary Steven T. Mnuchin  https://t.co/OvC7BBdXsk
The U.S. Small Business Administration is offering low-interest federal disaster loans to small businesses suffering as a result of the Coronavirus. You can learn more here.  https://t.co/mZm9AiJ1Hu
The IRS plans to send out economic impact payments in the next three weeks. Learn more about how that works here.  https://t.co/UapsEtBaBE

The Wake County school system has posted information on where families can get free food at https://t.co/pGdu5facy1. The district is offering curbside pickup on weekdays from 11 a.m. to 1 p.m. at more than 30 sites.  https://t.co/XuzirdRUKZ

I want to reassure folks that North Carolina is prepared to fight coronavirus. And Congress will be working with the administration and the CDC to ensure our state has every resource needed.  https://t.co/1D3dkSAiUf
While I was unable to attend due to an unplanned trip to the dentist I look forward to Congress getting back to work to build on our successes and to make our country more secure.

Last night’s State of the Union highlighted President Trump’s commitment to delivering on his promises to the country. Renegotiating trade deals and reforming our tax code has made our economy strong.
